ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We thank all citizen scientists for providing samples: Merz M., Jung P., Steinmann P., Huber M., Cigler H., Treitner S. and Gerber S. from the Naturmuseum Wallis and the company “Wildbiene+Partner”. Donstauder-Schrammel E. provided technical assistance during lab work and Jovana Bila Dubaić with QGIS. Further, we want to thank Meyer P. for two pictures of this species.
